title: Google is hiring everyone!
content: Google is now taking any job seeker that applies for a job! Hurry up and apply!

title: LinkedIn now places you in a job
content: The social media website LinkedIn will now guarantee you a job placement with their new program!

title: New Language CarterScript takes the world by storm!
content: CarterScript is a new programming language that can accomplish any task. Ever! Try it now!
